channel.title: SQLCop on Lee Brownhill's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in SQLCop on Lee Brownhill's Blog

item.title: Redgate SQLTest and SQLCop
item.description:
As part of Redgate SQL Test, you get SQLCop
(although the tests themselves are freely available to use).

SQLCop is a set of over 100 open-source tests for your databases.
The tests were originally maintained by George Mastros but are now managed by Redgate Software
